title: Why the mother preferred to live alone

content.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned in the story as a reason why the author’s mother preferred to live in a senior apartment?

choices.label: She wanted to stay close to her doctor’s office.
She didn’t want to disrupt the author’s family life.
She felt that she was still in good health.
She could participate in activities with others in her own age group.

content.answer: She wanted to stay close to her doctor’s office.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
